Description: Address to be used for appointment purposes
Name: OLI_ADTYPE_APPTPURPOSE
Definition: This Address is applicable for an appointment such as a paramed exam, signature, or some other appointment.

Name: OLI_ADTYPE_AGENTCSA
Definition: Carrier's address to be used by the agent for customer service.

Name: OLI_ADTYPE_BILLMAIL
Definition: The address used to send the bill notices.

Name: OLI_ADTYPE_CLAIMCENTER
Definition: Indicates that the address is the address for claim inquiries or claim processing submission.

Name: OLI_ADTYPE_CLIENTCSA
Definition: Carrier's address to be used by the client for customer service.

Name: OLI_ADTYPE_HDQRTRS
Definition: The address of a company or organization's headquarters location.

Name: OLI_ADTYPE_MAILING
Definition: The address to receive all correspondence unless otherwise specified address and can be different from a residential or business address. It can be different from a business shipping address. This address might be a post office box.

Name: OLI_ADTYPE_PRIMARY
Definition: An address that has been designated as the primary address for contact by mail. May be used when no other information (residence, mailing, billing, etc.) is known.

Name: OLI_ADTYPE_ALTERNATE
Definition: An address that has been designated as the secondary or alternate address for contact by mail. May be used when no other information (residence, mailing, billing, etc.) is known.
